sn50.99-108:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya panca balani bhavetabbani.
sn50.99-108:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhabalam bhaveti …pe… pannabalam bhaveti ragavinayapariyosanam dosavinayapariyosanam mohavinayapariyosanam.
sn50.99-108:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya imani panca balani bhavetabbani”ti.
